metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6509 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in extensions in Google Chrome prior to 83.0.4103.116allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto potentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted Chrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
